item.title: First master course
item.description:
First master course

10 NOV 2025

I have begun reading for my first mathematics course; the topic is geometry of Poisson manifolds and bracket algebras on them; by Arthemy V. Kiselev. This is one of the first courses, where the topic is truly exciting at an advanced level. Mathematical maturity is truly wonderful :)

Primary literature: Modern geometric structures and fields, 2005, Novikov, Taimanov.
